attributes.action: Make the UK sex offender register public!
attributes.additional_details:
This campaign is important because the human public should have the right to know if any sex offenders live in there area and who they are. Around the world there are many countries who has there sex offender register pubic, but at the moment the UK doesn't.

Don't the UK public have the right to know how safe there neighbourhood is or have the right to know if any sex offenders live in the area so they can be careful when they are out and about and protecting there children.

Well now is the time to change and by singing this petiton we will be one step closer of making the UK sex offenders register public.
